name: NSHapticFeedbackManager.PerformanceTime
desc: A time at which to provide haptic feedback to the user.

items.name: case `default`
items.desc: Allows the system to choose the most appropriate time for feedback to be provided. Currently, this is the next time the screen is updated.

items.name: case now
items.desc: Instructs the system to provide immediate haptic feedback to the user, rather than waiting for synchronization to occur with something visual occurring on screen.

items.name: case drawCompleted
items.desc: Instructs the system to provide haptic feedback to the user the next time the screen is updated.
